turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If they just made a pot fresh I want a venti regular

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want sugar or cream

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I take my coffee black

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any snacks with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No snacks but if the coffee isn't fresh I want to change the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a venti cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want regular milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of milks do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have full fat, low fat, skim and soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want low fat.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want an extra shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I want 2 extra shots.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What options are there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is regular sugar, equal, splenda and sweet and low.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one pack of equal mixed in and one on the side.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any flavoring in the coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay your order is placed.
